response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, but recognizing its immense worth to you, I am eager to make it available to you. My proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you for $1,200,000. I believe this price reflects both the product's value and the opportunity it presents to you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1200000}
